title: What languages were spoken in Asia Minor before the Battle of Manzikert in 1071 other than Greek and maybe Armenian? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is hard to know what people spoke. Literate people, and city people in general, spoke Greek and Armenian, but who knows whether there were villages where some dialect of Galatian or Isaurian was still spoken, or where there were already speakers of Laz or Turkish there? As far as I know, there is no written record of any of this, but the great mass of people didn’t leave written records.
